subject: Broken Handle Clip - BLD-Travel Harmony (Out of Warranty)
body:
Hi,

I purchased a BreezeLite BLD-Travel Harmony folding hairdryer back in December 2025. It has been wonderful for my travel needs.

Unfortunately, the folding handle mechanism broke last week when I was closing it up after a trip. The click mechanism that locks the handle in place is no longer working properly.

While I realize this might be outside the warranty period (it's been about 6 months), I wanted to reach out and see if there's any coverage or if you have affordable repair options available.

I'm attaching photos of the broken handle mechanism.

Thanks,
Patricia Wong
patricia.wong@email.com
